name: Searfoss, Appellant, v. White Haven Borough School District
name_abbreviation: Searfoss v. White Haven Borough School District

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Searfoss, Appellant, v. White Haven Borough School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below sustaining the defendants’ preliminary objections and dismissing the plaintiffs’ complaint is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Lewis of the 11th Judicial District for the court en banc.
Decree affirmed at the appellants’ costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Albert F. Maicr and Nelson A. Bryan, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Searfoss, Appellant, v. White Haven Borough School District.
Submitted November 19, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
Conrad A. Falvello, for appellants.
Albert F. Maicr and Nelson A. Bryan, for appellees.
December 30, 1959:
